title: copy to s3 fails because of checksum issue - same as in closed bug #8432
body:
<!--


-->

#### The associated forum post URL from `https://forum.rclone.org`
https://forum.rclone.org/t/rclone-copy-from-do-to-aws-s3-fails-for-some-files/52132


#### What is the problem you are having with rclone?

It fails to copy some files from Digital Ocean to AWS s3

#### What is your rclone version (output from `rclone version`)
rclone v1.71.0-beta.8968.d4e68bf66


#### Which OS you are using and how many bits (e.g. Windows 7, 64 bit)
 os/version: almalinux 9.6 (64 bit)
- os/kernel: 5.14.0-570.28.1.el9_6.x86_64 (x86_64)
- os/type: linux
- os/arch: amd64


#### Which cloud storage system are you using? (e.g. Google Drive)
From - Digital Ocean 
To     - AWS s3


#### The command you were trying to run (e.g. `rclone copy /tmp remote:tmp`)

 rclone copyto -vv --metadata do-weedvader:weedvader/static/1508204081-OG-Medicinals_Triangle_Kush.jpg s3-weedvader:weedvader-objects/static/test05.jpg

#### A log from the command with the `-vv` flag (e.g. output from `rclone -vv copy /tmp remote:tmp`)

2025/08/03 16:46:55 DEBUG : rclone: Version "v1.71.0-beta.8968.d4e68bf66" starting with parameters ["rclone" "copyto" "-vv" "--metadata" "do-weedvader:weedvader/static/1508204081-OG-Medicinals_Triangle_Kush.jpg" "s3-weedvader:weedvader-objects/static/test05.jpg"]
2025/08/03 16:46:55 DEBUG : Creating backend with remote "do-weedvader:weedvader/static/1508204081-OG-Medicinals_Triangle_Kush.jpg"
2025/08/03 16:46:55 DEBUG : Using config file from "/root/.config/rclone/rclone.conf"
2025/08/03 16:46:55 DEBUG : fs cache: renaming child cache item "do-weedvader:weedvader/static/1508204081-OG-Medicinals_Triangle_Kush.jpg" to be canonical for parent "do-weedvader:weedvader/static"
2025/08/03 16:46:55 DEBUG : Creating backend with remote "s3-weedvader:weedvader-objects/static/"
2025/08/03 16:46:55 DEBUG : fs cache: renaming cache item "s3-weedvader:weedvader-objects/static/" to be canonical "s3-weedvader:weedvader-objects/static"
2025/08/03 16:46:56 DEBUG : 1508204081-OG-Medicinals_Triangle_Kush.jpg: Need to transfer - File not found at Destination
2025/08/03 16:46:56 ERROR : 1508204081-OG-Medicinals_Triangle_Kush.jpg: Failed to copy: operation error S3: PutObject, https response error StatusCode: 400, RequestID: V0G3VKE09SCPE74W, HostID: Od6WiRg2x7S8lToJ3TmhJrNPDcov5hrqsu3qJIspHmKsVPnnVJcjLYJX0/nCC7ZxtLDET6fGSQ4=, api error InvalidArgument: aws-chunked encoding is not supported when x-amz-content-sha256 UNSIGNED-PAYLOAD is supplied.
2025/08/03 16:46:56 ERROR : Attempt 1/3 failed with 1 errors and: operation error S3: PutObject, https response error StatusCode: 400, RequestID: V0G3VKE09SCPE74W, HostID: Od6WiRg2x7S8lToJ3TmhJrNPDcov5hrqsu3qJIspHmKsVPnnVJcjLYJX0/nCC7ZxtLDET6fGSQ4=, api error InvalidArgument: aws-chunked encoding is not supported when x-amz-content-sha256 UNSIGNED-PAYLOAD is supplied.

2025/08/03 16:46:56 ERROR : Attempt 2/3 failed with 1 errors and: operation error S3: PutObject, https response error StatusCode: 400, RequestID: V0G9D4DQWWX57ZGT, HostID: rnXzPNUaPkJ9CJ2opY/ysud/4NROn13AlKmsyAJBGzs+ydlKEalA2TuAexFAZ9yWnM9N/ZX4TLQ=, api error InvalidArgument: aws-chunked encoding is not supported when x-amz-content-sha256 UNSIGNED-PAYLOAD is supplied.

2025/08/03 16:46:56 ERROR : 1508204081-OG-Medicinals_Triangle_Kush.jpg: Failed to copy: operation error S3: PutObject, https response error StatusCode: 400, RequestID: V0G0SYY655WYGV32, HostID: 1xn3O5cogAqw5GoIx6bnnWJkDyyi0a/FVPL+EF0wJJM6VCHFkskiAzUC0secKxiSWTA2U32rK/8=, api error InvalidArgument: aws-chunked encoding is not supported when x-amz-content-sha256 UNSIGNED-PAYLOAD is supplied.

#### How to use GitHub

* Please use the üëç [reaction](https://blog.github.com/2016-03-10-add-reactions-to-pull-requests-issues-and-comments/) to show that you are affected by the same issue.
